_sText:
Here it is! Prince of Persia style defuse map for CS:S. I hope you enjoy things like guillotines, spikes, gates, potions, poisons etc. Special thanks to Jordan Mechner for the idea of the original game. If you'll find any bugs please post a feedback here.

Edit (08.02.2014)
Added layout preview from the side of map. "Droga jednokierunkowa" means "one-way traffic".

Edit (03.03.2014)
